divs: Sighting Detailswe saw it monday night. we saw it uesday night as well as a friend. it was ahovering object we could only see the lights on it. lights changed many shapesand colors. had emmissions looking like strings, then dots. dots appeared toreturn to object. also it seemed like it had gaseous emissions and at times aglow around it. we knew it was not a plane, balloon etc. it hovered side toside, and up and down. saw beams coming from bottom, sides and top. we saw alight straw on top several times. my friend at another location saw it too, aswe talked on phone while watching. we called local tv weather station , theysaid no balloons or meteors etc. appendages kept popping out at all angles andcolors.
Summary: my wife and i, plus a friend saw lights on an obje
